item.description: Join Charley Eiseman and Noah Charney, authors of Tracks and Signs of Insects, for a program about our favorite arachnids - spiders. Charlie and Noah will present a slide show about local spiders and their signs (webs, egg sacs, etc.) and behaviors, and then take us exploring outside to see some of our resident Fresh Pond spiders up close and personal. To register, e-mail friendsoffreshpond@yahoo.com or call (617) 349-6489 and leave your name and phone number.
item.name: Spider Program
